page.shortlink: ux data control data bound image control
page.description: Places a data-bound image control on the component. Data-bound means that the image data it tied, or bound, to a server-side database. The images on the server can then be used to populate the image data displayed on a client-side device, like a mobile phone. Images that are not data-bound can be add to a component using the [Image] control in the other controls section.
